channel.title: Patch ideas! (For next patch. Balancing)
channel.description:
[color=orange]MY IDEAS FOR A NEW PATCH! everyone is gonna hate me.[/color] Balancing ideas -
> [color=purple]The Herbalist - Unseen Offensive (Buff)[/color] Effect update - Defile Can now target king and will show up with, GK, Cult King, Unseen King, Psycho King. etc
> [color=grey]The Scorned - Neutral Social (Buff)[/color] Effect update - Disguise Can now target king and will show up with, GK, Cult King, Unseen King, Psycho King. etc
> [color=grey]The Possessor - Neutral Killer (Buff)[/color] Effect update - Facelift will show up with, GK, Cult King, Unseen King, Psycho King Instead if you have possessed the king.
> [color=blue]The Knight - Blue Dragon Killer (Day Ability)[/color] New Day Ability - Scare, Make targets next ability backfire on them self. They will not know until they use one. (Day abilities only, 3 uses, [color=purple]Enforcer gets this too.[/color])
> [color=red] CULT BOOST! [/color] When the cult leader sacrifices, This night the cult is unable to convert and the sacrificed member can not use abilities. Each cult member gets their own boost dependant on the member. > Cult Leader: Attacks Bypass Healing. > Invoker: Gains Death Immunity > Ritualist: Is able to use abilities. Even in jail. >Seeker: Can target two players tonight. >Apostle: Gains Cult Spy tomorrow.
>[color=red] Apostle Rework. [/color] >Instead of court spy, Apostle will be able to use intrigue. which is 3 uses.

item.title: Patch ideas! (For next patch. Balancing)
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
Reminds me of when I killed a reaper
King dies
3 peps very trusty step up
Night after that I protect the best claim between the two
Hit reaper
Night after that I protect the other one
Hit reaper
Reaper dies
I die

Read full topic

item.title: Patch ideas! (For next patch. Balancing)
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Also I’m going to say it Cult needs a pretty big rework imo.

Read full topic

item.title: Patch ideas! (For next patch. Balancing)
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
SabreOverdrive:

The Herbalist - Unseen Offensive (Buff)
Effect update - Defile Can now target king and will show up with, GK, Cult King, Unseen King, Psycho King. etc

The Scorned - Neutral Social (Buff)
Effect update - Disguise Can now target king and will show up with, GK, Cult King, Unseen King, Psycho King. etc

The Possessor - Neutral Killer (Buff)
Effect update - Facelift will show up with, GK, Cult King, Unseen King, Psycho King Instead if you have possessed the king.

I’m fine with all of these Tbh, only issue with GK it will be kinda obvious if you changed them in the day so scorned shouldn’t target starting kings, also assuming you kept poss force vote thier

SabreOverdrive:

The Knight - Blue Dragon Killer (Day Ability)
New Day Ability - Scare, Make targets next ability backfire on them self. They will not know until they use one. (Day abilities only, 3 uses, Enforcer gets this too.)

Summary

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=umDr0mPuyQc

Knight shouldn’t have a confirm day ability.

SabreOverdrive:

CULT BOOST!
When the cult leader sacrifices, This night the cult is unable to convert and the sacrificed member can not use abilities. Each cult member gets their own boost dependant on the member.
Cult Leader: Attacks Bypass Healing.
Invoker: Gains Death Immunity
Ritualist: Is able to use abilities. Even in jail.
Seeker: Can target two players tonight.
Apostle: Gains Cult Spy tomorrow.

Sort of like this idea but it’s too weak for sacrificing all your cult member

SabreOverdrive:

Apostle Rework.
Instead of court spy, Apostle will be able to use intrigue. which is 3 uses.

No Thanks, I don’t even like gossip I’ll be honest it’s stupid and confirms people I feel like noble needs a rework

Read full topic

item.title: Patch ideas! (For next patch. Balancing)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
• I DO support being able to defile, disguise, and facelift kings.
  • I do NOT support what is in effect giving Knight the Drunk’s Debauchery ability.
  • I would rather Sacrifice simply provide a new use of Eradicate immediately when night begins.
  • I do NOT support replacing Apostle’s Spy with Intrigue because then reading whispers would be another proof for Noble claims in Cult games.

Read full topic

item.description:
Don’t you just hate it when you are ritualist and the CL doesn’t sacrafice so you can’t use abilities.

item.description:
Discord is our main hub, if you need answers as player, it’s way faster to go there. The FoL mods are “solely” forum mods, and no ToL mods (with the exception of me, who’s doing double duty as judge and fol mod).

item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
anon97870008:

That has to be a misperception

I mainly get this from the regular updates the forum has gotten in recent times alongside a unique modteam.
I might be mistaken since I can’t read minds though.

item.title: Patch ideas! (For next patch. Balancing)
item.dc:creator: anon97870008
item.description:
Defile/Disguise/Facelift change

Only Facelift can directly interact with the king, and Poss can just decide to not facelift if he wants to show up as King, when jumping out of a king’s body.

The Knight - Blue Dragon Killer (Day Ability)
New Day Ability - Scare, Make targets next ability backfire on them self. They will not know until they use one. (Day abilities only, 3 uses, Enforcer gets this too.)

Oof no.

Cult Boosts

Is pretty complicated, and I don’t think cult really needs this buff?

Apostle Rework

The ability to read whispers is pretty important and pretty helpful. Also Cult has already several abilities which can mess up with invest results.

Geyde:

since they have somewhat equivalent importance

That has to be a misperception.

Read full topic

item.title: Patch ideas! (For next patch. Balancing)
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
If pushing this forum is less important than pushing Discord, then I get.
I’m currently under the impression that it would only be a good idea since they have somewhat equivalent importance, despite the drastic number difference.

What I think:
ToL >>> Discord = FoL

What probably is the case:
ToL >>> Discord > FoL

Read full topic

item.title: Patch ideas! (For next patch. Balancing)
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
QoL change mostly.
Discord link is easily available, so why not also promote your other endorsed platform?

Personally, it took me a long time to discover FoL. I only found out about it after some digging (?)

Read full topic

item.title: Patch ideas! (For next patch. Balancing)
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
MaximusPrime:

meh, cool bc you can make kings appear as the opposite but still, really niche and not very good imo cuz you can usually tell if a king is good/evil

I’m not sure the goal is to add a powerful option.
It’s kind of unintuitive to not be able to target king with many non-BD abilities.

item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
SabreOverdrive:

Effect update - Defile Can now target king and will show up with, GK, Cult King, Unseen King, Psycho King. etc

meh, cool bc you can make kings appear as the opposite but still, really niche and not very good imo cuz you can usually tell if a king is good/evil

SabreOverdrive:

New Day Ability - Scare, Make targets next ability backfire on them self. They will not know until they use one.

meh
3 uses is also a lot

meh i just dont really like this for some reason

SabreOverdrive:

CULT BOOST!
When the cult leader sacrifices, This night the cult is unable to convert and the sacrificed member can not use abilities. Each cult member gets their own boost dependant on the member.
Cult Leader: Attacks Bypass Healing.
Invoker: Gains Death Immunity
Ritualist: Is able to use abilities. Even in jail.
Seeker: Can target two players tonight.
Apostle: Gains Cult Spy tomorrow.

so i guess this is a 1 shot that you can save up? eh, not worth it tbh bc you gotta survive a day for the sac to finish and be able to use the effects and you can’t sacrifice the cult leader so ??? -_-
